duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze and process client-initiated outgoing distributions, transfers, and rollover requests.
Communicate effectively with clients, third parties, and entities to resolve discrepancies and follow-up on requests.

Adhere strictly to trust regulations and security standards, including customer identification program, the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act, Bank Secrecy Act, Internal Revenue Code, and other applicable banking and trust regulation.
Process outgoing cash transactions in the trust accounting system (ACH, checks, and wires) and ensure accuracy and compliance with client instructions.
Archive and note all documentation related to cash transactions in Salesforce.
Process outgoing ACAT transactions and address vendor rejects in a timely manner.
Follow up with contra-firms, communicate with clients via phone, and advise them of request status.
Remediate any client issues or concerns and adhere to all procedures related to client contact.
Assist in cashiering activities related to client conversions and deconversions under senior team members' guidance.
Develop an understanding of complex distribution activities under senior team members' guidance.

education_certification.credential: 1 year of Financial Services experience preferred
